meta-review.comment: Welcome to the Wonderlands! Tiny Tina’s Wonderlands is a fantastical, zany adventure that feels like a breath of fresh air in the Borderlands universe. With its action-packed gameplay, hilarious writing, and the perfect blend of RPG and shooter elements, this game is a rollicking good time for both new players and Borderlands veterans. The mix of on-the-spot creativity and frenetic combat keeps you engaged throughout, while the variety of class combinations ensures every Fatemaker is a unique force to be reckoned with. Sure, it may not reinvent the wheel, but it spins it in such a delightful way that you can't help but join the fun. So grab your swords, spells, and guns, and get ready for a wild time in the Wonderlands!
